turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want them two to be cheese and two to be pepperoni. And can you add extra cheese to all of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, there is an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to confirm your order, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas, 2 cheese, 2 pepperoni, all extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
